mapper.sql:
t_house_asset_match_log.id, t_house_asset_match_log.owner_user_id AS ownerUserId, t_house_asset_match_log.owner_asset_id AS ownerAssetId, t_house_asset_match_log.matched_user_id AS matchedUserId, t_house_asset_match_log.mathched_asset_id AS mathchedAssetId, t_house_asset_match_log.create_time AS createTime,
asset1.house_number AS ownerNumber, building1.code AS ownerBuilding, community1.community AS ownerCommunity, t_end_user1.name As ownerName, t_end_user1.avatar AS ownerAvatar, t_end_user1.phone AS ownerPhone, t_end_user1.real_name AS ownerRealName,
asset2.house_number AS matchedNumber, building2.code AS matchedBuilding, community2.community AS matchedCommunity, t_end_user2.name As matchedName, t_end_user2.avatar AS matchedAvatar, t_end_user2.phone AS matchedPhone, t_end_user2.real_name AS matchedRealName

SELECT children.id FROM t_sys_org, t_sys_org as children WHERE t_sys_org.left_num <= children.left_num AND t_sys_org.right_num >= children.left_num and t_sys_org.id = #{record.orgId} order by t_sys_org.node_level ASC
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_asset_match_log.* FROM t_house_asset_match_log WHERE t_house_asset_match_log.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_asset_match_log.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_asset_match_log JOIN t_house_asset AS asset1 ON asset1.id = t_house_asset_match_log.owner_asset_id JOIN t_house_asset AS asset2 ON asset2.id = t_house_asset_match_log.mathched_asset_id
JOIN t_house_property_building AS building1 ON asset1.building_id = building1.id JOIN t_house_property_building AS building2 ON asset2.building_id = building2.id
JOIN t_house_property_community AS community1 ON community1.id = building1.community_id JOIN t_house_property_community AS community2 ON community2.id = building2.community_id
JOIN t_end_user As t_end_user1 ON t_house_asset_match_log.owner_user_id=t_end_user1.id JOIN t_end_user AS t_end_user2 ON t_house_asset_match_log.matched_user_id=t_end_user2.id
,() AS ownedOrgIds
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_asset_match_log.org_id = ownedOrgIds.id
AND t_house_asset_match_log.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_asset_match_log.org_id IN ()
AND t_house_asset_match_log.owner_user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.ownerUserId},'%')
AND t_house_asset_match_log.owner_asset_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.ownerAssetId},'%')
AND t_house_asset_match_log.matched_user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.matchedUserId},'%')
AND t_house_asset_match_log.mathched_asset_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.mathchedAssetId},'%')
AND t_house_asset_match_log.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_house_asset_match_log.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_asset_match_log.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
-- 额外搜索
OR (building1.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.ownerBuilding},'%')and asset1.house_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.ownerNumber},'%'))
OR (building2.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.matchedBuilding},'%') and asset2.house_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.matchedNumber},'%'))
AND ( t_end_user1.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_end_user1.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_end_user2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_end_user2.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR asset1.house_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR asset2.house_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR building2.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR building1.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
ORDER BY t_house_asset_match_log.create_time DESC,t_house_asset_match_log.owner_user_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_house_asset_match_log Where (t_house_asset_match_log.owner_user_id = #{userId} and t_house_asset_match_log.owner_asset_id = #{assetId}) or (t_house_asset_match_log.matched_user_id = #{userId} and t_house_asset_match_log.mathched_asset_id = #{assetId})
